summary: This document is an Equifax credit report for an individual named Michael A Thomas, showing personal identification, credit accounts, collection accounts, and inquiries. It details various loans, credit cards, and a child support collection account, providing a financial snapshot of the individual. This document appears to be a credit file or financial inquiry report, listing various financial institutions and inquiry dates. It is followed by a standard summary of consumer rights under the Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA). The document contains no narrative about individuals or events related to the Epstein case.
